**gauge ** 1 motif = 4 inches square pattern is available from crochet me website and coats & clark 1 pattern is available from knit and crochet today show 108 granny squares & crochet flowers 2 direct link to pattern pdf file 3 when logged into website additional information by the designer at her blog

finished size  

small medium large to fit bust sizes 28&rdquo -32&rdquo 33&rdquo -36&rdquo 38&rdquo -44&rdquo and upper arm circumference 9&rdquo 12&rdquo 15&rdquo
